Uses of Class
org.apache.drill.jdbc.AlreadyClosedSqlException

  • Packages that use AlreadyClosedSqlException 
    Package Description
    org.apache.drill.jdbc
    JDBC driver for Drill.

    • Uses of AlreadyClosedSqlException in org.apache.drill.jdbc

      Methods in org.apache.drill.jdbc that throw AlreadyClosedSqlException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int DrillConnection.getNetworkTimeout()
      Drill: Returns zero.
      int DrillStatement.getQueryTimeout()
      Drill: Returns zero, indicating that no timeout is set.
      void DrillConnection.setNetworkTimeout(Executor executor, int milliseconds)
      Drill: Not supported (for non-zero timeout value).
      void DrillStatement.setQueryTimeout(int milliseconds)
      Drill: Not supported (for non-zero timeout value).
